glosses: to pity, feel pity and compassion for

examples.translation: I really felt pity for the beggar we saw.

glosses: to be unable to give up (something); to feel sorrow for, regret
to ache, to be in pain, to hurt

examples.text: Geçirdiğim trafik kazasından beri kolum çok acıyor.
examples.translation: My arm hurts so much ever since the traffic accident I had.

etymology:
From Ottoman Turkish آجیمق (acımak), from Proto-Turkic *xāčï-, *iāčï- (“to become bitter, sour”).
Cognate with Karakhanid [script needed] (ačï-, “to sour”), Azerbaijani acımaq (“to turn rancid”), Kyrgyz ачуу (acuu, “to turn sour”), Southern Altai ачыыр (ačïïr, “to turn sour”), ачу (aču, “bitter”), Tuvan ажыыр (ajıır, “to spoil”), Yakut аһый (ahïy, “to go sour”).
